data.title: Foreign Math
data.statement:
Given a formula in an unknown language, and a dictionary in the default code, translate the expression and perform the calculation. Order of operations is left to right (e.g.  1+2/3 = 1).

Example: "gumbro oombga abido nikta ulpika"
Translation: "one plus two divided-by three"
Calculation: 1+2/3 = (1+2)/3 = 3/3 = 1

testCases.title: Three Operations
testCases.testIn: lapri nikta abido dofta vivast nikta abido

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: vivast dofta bowfu nikta abido oombga lapri

testCases.title: Four Operators
testCases.testIn: vivast clebo abido nikta abido clebo lapri nikta vivast

testCases.title: Validator 7
testCases.testIn: bowfu dofta noflu dofta lapri clebo poskul nikta noflu

testCases.title: Order Matters!
testCases.testIn: gumbro dofta bowfu clebo abido nikta poskul

testCases.title: Validator 8
testCases.testIn: ulpika dofta ribiku nikta abido clebo noflu

data.constraints:
2 < Word count in [[F]] < 10
Words in [[F]] will alternate "number operation number operation number..."
All expressions will be valid, and result in integers.
data.stubGenerator:
read F:string(256)

STATEMENT
Use the folowing definitions to translate and and solve the foreign expression:
"oombga" = "plus"
"dofta" = "minus"
"clebo" = "multiplied-by"
"nikta" = "divided-by"
"gumbro" = "one"
"abido" = "two"
"ulpika" = "three"
"noflu" = "four"
"vivast" = "five"
"lapri" = "six"
"ribiku" = "seven"
"poskul" = "eight"
"bowfu" = "nine"

INPUT
F: the foreign expression: "number operation number..."

write integer
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> The foreign expression to be solved, [[F]], an odd amount of space separated words.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> An integer that is the result of the converted formula.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a formula in an unknown language, and a dictionary in the default code, translate the expression and perform the calculation. Order of operations is left to right (e.g. 1+2/3 = 1).

Example: "gumbro oombga abido nikta ulpika"
Translation: "one plus two divided-by three"
Calculation: 1+2/3 = (1+2)/3 = 3/3 = 1
Input
Line 1: The foreign expression to be solved, F, an odd amount of space separated words.
Output
Line 1: An integer that is the result of the converted formula.
Constraints
2 < Word count in F < 10
Words in F will alternate "number operation number operation number..."
All expressions will be valid, and result in integers.
Example
Input
gumbro oombga bowfu
Output
10
